alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 5:16PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Las Animas County through 545 PM MDT... At 515 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles north of Kim, or 34 miles south of North La Junta, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Las Animas County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southeastern Colorado.
